page.title: 12 The lifeboat station
page.content: The first lifeboat came to Weston-super-Mare{lifeboat station}in 1881. There has been a lifeboat station at Birnbeck pier for a long time. When it first started they had small wooden boats with a big crew to row on the oars.Years later they had a bigger,stronger wooden boat with a powerful engine. Later on the pier changed hands and the rents went up so high the lifeboats moved to another place. Now they use a big inflatable craft made of tough rubber.It also has an outboard motor to get it to the people who need help quickly. There is a{lifeboat shop}at Anchor Head where people can buy things and the money goes to the lifeboat institution.
